title: HSCC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 09 Manager & Deputy Manager Posts
description: The Hospital Services Consultancy Corporation Limited (HSCC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 09 General Manager, Deputy General Manager, Senior Manager, Deputy Manager, and Manager Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil, Mechanical Engineering, Any Degree, MBA, Post-graduation, can apply for the HSCC Recruitment 20...
